attributes.action: not increase VAT and NI by 20%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a disgrace, our country is already a laughing stock to the world by how our government continue to rob its own public. Now with this increase we are expected to work just as hard, do just as many hours and pick up less money yet the cost of living will be even more?? We should not have to suffer because the government has got us into debt, please sign and do not stand by and let them take your hard earned money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
